name: Descend Into The Scrawl
description:
'Descend Into The Scrawl' is a short platformer game where you traverse the run-down rooms of the Scrawl. Uncover its secrets and find out what lies beneath it. The game consists of a total of 5 levels, increasing in difficulty. Use your traversal tools to surpass obstacles and get through the levels! 

- CONTROLS -

[A] and [D] - horizontal movement

[Space] - Jump (Holding [Space] will make you jump higher)

[Shift] - Dash (Players have a max of two dashes that will replenish over time and after a level)

-System Requirements-

Minimum GPU: RTX 1050ti

NOT Recommended on Laptops!
